――メイズシフターを倒した一行は、\n静音モードにして慎重に広間〈ホール〉を進ん:
—The party that had defeated the Mayz-Sifter
I set it to silent mode and carefully advanced through the hall.
先頭にいた舞亜の機体が停止した。: Maia, who was at the head of the group, came to a stop.
うぉおおおおおおおお！！ ついについに……！！\nこの目で原生帯〈プライマル・ベ:
Uwaaaaahhhh!! Finally, finally...!!
I was able to see Primal Belt with my own eyes!!
ここが原生帯〈プライマル・ベルト〉か……: So this is the Primal Belt...
大昔にメイズ内に入り込んだ動植物が、\n重力異常に適応して独自の生態系を作ったん:
Animals and plants that had entered the maise a long time ago
It adapted to gravity anomalies and created its own ecosystem!!
メイズ研代表として、\nこの光景見てテンション上がらない理由ある！？:
As a representative of the Mayse Institute,
Is there any reason not to get excited after seeing this?!
ねえ！ サンプル回収してもいい！？: Hey! Can I get a sample?!
ここに来た目的を忘れていませんか……？: Haven't you forgotten why you came here...?
再訓練でしょ！ でもちょっとくらい……ダメ？: It's retraining, isn't it? But can't I...?
……ダメよ。そういった油断が取り返しのつかない事故に繋がるわ。\nここがメイズシ:
...No. That kind of carelessness will lead to an irreparable accident.
Haven't you forgotten that this is the domain of the Maizsifter?
原生帯〈プライマル・ベルト〉には地穴帯〈ケイブ・ベルト〉以上に、\n強力で危険な:
There was more to the Primal Belt than the Cave Belt
There's a powerful and dangerous maise shifter living here.
怖いですぅ、死んじゃいますぅ……！\n舞亜さん、もう帰りましょうよぉ～！:
I'm scared, I'll die...!
Maia, let's go home!
それではこの先はどうしましょうか。\nえっと、確か基礎課程では――:
Well then, what should we do next?
Um, if I remember correctly, in the basic course――
斥候とは少数で先行し、進行先の動静や地形を探る役目を担う。\nいわゆる偵察をする:
Scouts were a small number of people who went ahead and played a role of investigating the motions and terrain of their advance.
It's what they call reconnaissance.
ええ、それが正解よ。\n斥候部隊のリーダーはうるうね。:
Yes, that's the correct answer.
The leader of the scouts is so noisy.
えっ！？ 無理無理無理です！！\n負けます！ 死にます！ 滅びますぅ！:
Huh?! Impossible, impossible, impossible!!
I’ll lose! I’m gonna die! I'm gonna be destroyed!
いつもそう言うけど、なんだかんだでちゃんとこなしてるじゃない。\nだからお願いね:
You always say that, but for some reason, you're doing a good job.
So please do.
……それで編成だけど、うるうについてもらうのは、\nラミちゃんと白奈ちゃんにお願:
...So, about the formation...
Maybe I should ask Rami-chan and Shirona-chan for help.
うぅ……あ、あんまり期待はしないでくださいね？\nもしメイズシフターの餌になった:
Ugh... D-Don't get your hopes up, okay?
If I end up as bait for the Mazesifter... I-I'm sorry...!
めっちゃ不安要素しかないんだけど！？: There's nothing to worry about, though!
大丈夫よ。口ではこう言ってるけど、やるときはやる子だから。: Don't worry. She says this with her mouth, but she's a good girl when it comes to doing things.
……そう言われても、わたし達はそれを知らない。: ...Even if you say that, we don't know that.
リーダー役のうるうの自信なさそうな発言は気になる。: I'm curious about what the leader, Uru, said that didn't sound very confident.
とはいえ、特別講師としてカラフルブーケから選抜された以上、\n頼りにしてもいいの:
That said, since she had been selected from the colorful bouquet as a special lecturer,
It was probably okay to rely on her.
だからここで俺が声をかけるべきは……: That's why I need to talk to her here...
ラミ。ちょっといいか。: Rami. Do you have a moment?
えー、なにー？ 前に出るラミに励ましの声的な？: Whaaat? What? Is it encouraging to hear Rami step forward?
ああ、がんばってな……囮役。: Yeah, good luck... playing the decoy.
いや、斥候だよね！？\nなんか犠牲になりそうなんだけど！！:
No, they're scouts, aren't they?!
I feel like I'm going to be sacrificed!!
全然励ます気ないじゃん！！: You're not trying to cheer me up at all!!
……まあ、確かに別にあまり心配はしてないな。: ...Well, it's true that I'm not that worried.
だってラミなら、ちゃんとやれるってわかってるし。: I mean, I know Rami can do it.
緊張……はしてないようだな。落ち着いているのはいいことだ。: You don't seem nervous. It's a good thing you're calm.
お前ならなんだかんだで、\n初めてのエリアでもそつなくこなすだろうと思ってるよ。:
You might be able to do something,
I'm sure you'll be able to handle your first time in an area like this.
……そう。%usernameusernameuserna%にはそう見えるんだ。: ...That's right. That's what it looks like to %usernameusernameuserna%.
『そう見える』とは？: What do you mean by 'seems that way'?
ううん、なんでもない。やれるだけ……やる。: No, it's nothing. I'll... do what I can.
ああ、何か問題があったら、すぐ助けに入るから。: Yeah, if there's a problem, I'll come to your rescue right away.
